website_summaries.verdict: For those who love Macintosh, this mini desktop from Apple is a perfect choice.
pros: Has 512GB of SSD storage for maximum performance
Features a better graphics processor and CPU than you normally find in a mini desktop
Includes advanced security chip from Apple for secure operation
cons: One of the most expensive mini desktops on the market

customer_reviews.title: MacMini Not 2020 but 2018
customer_reviews.text: The Mac Mini I purchased had a specs description with a release date of 03/18/2020. The one I received was from 2018. A new one from Apple is only $16.59 more for the latest version. The seller averted this question when asked about the date of manufacture. Check out the Answered Questions section. I also had to call Apple tech support to get the AppleCare for this Mac. They didn't know why AppleCare was refused on line, but it may have to do with it being from 2018. The Mac Mini is just fine. Works great. Just wished I knew it was a 2018 model and not fooled that it is a 2020.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: This is 2018 version! Not 2020! Cannot believe Amazon just lies about it!
customer_reviews.text: Check the box and also the "About this Mac" when you turn on the mac mini. It is 2018, not 2020
customer_reviews.author: Xiaolong Miao

customer_reviews.title: Hazardous electrical issue with the 2020 Mac mini I received
customer_reviews.text: Just a quick heads up for anyone considering the new 2020 Mac mini — I assume that this is a one off production issue that just affected this unit, but it's a new one for me so something to check when you unbox and set up one of these. When I plugged it in and ran my fingers along the metal of the case, I received an electric shock/buzz. The issue goes away after unplugging it, so there's definitely an issue with the power supply or construction of this particular unit. If I decide to purchase another one after returning this one I will update this review to confirm that it was an isolated issue which I assume it is.
customer_reviews.author: dakishimesan

customer_reviews.title: MAC mini
customer_reviews.text: I needed a computer for my studies as alternative to my laptop which I could not fix the battery during this health pandemic. I decided to go with MAC Mini cause I had a desktop TV for gaming so I can invest on using it, which is more productive for me. However, I thought it is 2020, but it is 2018. as long as the product information such as process and memory are good for me that's enough, but still I wish if the seller had mentioned it clearly as not 2020 !! which affects his credibility
customer_reviews.author: iamAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MacMini 2018 Model A1993 not 2020
customer_reviews.text: The computer overall as a whole is great as you would expect with other Mac products however, if you're specifically looking for 2020 hardware parts, then this is not the one. I think these computers that Amazon is selling are 2018 models that have been updated to the newest Specs by Apple. They are brand new computers in the original wrapping. Just that the hardware is not the 2020 version. I contacted Amazon to try and fix this in the description especially for those really wanting the 2020 version.
customer_reviews.author: Fabian Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Defective Batch of Items
customer_reviews.text: This item—scratch that—two of this item, have been defective. They BOTH would not start up unless it was loaded into safe mode, which dramatically reduces the item’s performance. Apple support couldnt even understand what was happening. This item is not satisfactory and must have been tampered with in some way. Not satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Akira L.

customer_reviews.title: Mac Mini is the desktop of my choice
customer_reviews.text: RAM underpowered for me. Was known and upgraded by myself to 64. Parallel user. Think about SSD size. Enough for me but heavy users will need more. Have to buy it at the time of purchase. All said, it is an Apple product and delivers the quality that come with it. Great design, low footprint. Ready for Thunderbolt 3, why I decided. No more low USB offline storage / time machines speeds ever again. Expensive but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Cybersecurity Guy

customer_reviews.title: This machine has the performance of a 2005 Wintel PC
customer_reviews.text: Be amazed as you can render a web page in less than one minute. Type in an address into Safari, and within just 15-20 seconds, it will respond and begin downloading the web page. Soon you will be able to see pictures and stuff. Just go get a cup of coffee and when you return it will be ready. Seriously Apple. Your entire OS is a gigantic piece of unefficient bloatware. My CPU % is never above 30%, my RAM is less than 50% utilized, yet it takes MINUTES for webpages to load. And don't say it's my network. When I do get speedtest.net to load after 5 minutes, it tests fine. Your software sucks and you should feel bad.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Labuzan

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't even boot up
customer_reviews.text: This was our 4th and last Mac Mini. Our first, years ago, was replaced by Apple due to malfunction. The second repeatedly corrupted its hard drive, and ultimately wasn't supported by Apple due to obsolescence. The third just got slower and slower to the point of being unusable. This 4th one didn't even boot up out of the box. Apple is known for good hardware, but all 4 MacMinis we had had issues. We're looking elsewhere now. Come on, Apple. You can do better.
customer_reviews.author: Appreciate the Help!

customer_reviews.title: Amazon sold me 2018 not 2020.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. its shocking amazon directly screwed me over on this deal. I only checked because of the other reviews. If you bought this recently check the ABOUT WINDOW because this is not okay. False advertising.

customer_reviews.title: Watch out, this is a 2018 model not 2020

customer_reviews.title: Overdue upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this Mini due to a storm taking out my 2012 Mac Mini. I like the new Space Gray finish and more current Thunderbolt & USB-C ports. I also ordered the matching dock from Amazon for additional ports and SD card slots. Runs smooth and now I can take advantage of more of the Mac OS features that my 2012 was too old to support.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! It is 2018 version as many have stated
customer_reviews.text: I had many doubts about this little machine. I am pleasantly surprised. It booted up quickly and connected to wifi. I'm using this Mac Mini mainly for Web Development. So happy. I hooked this up to my 27 in AOC 1080p 144hz and it worked with zero hiccups.

customer_reviews.title: Mac is the best
customer_reviews.text: Oh yeah. Waited 11 years for this. Took awhile to set up because it’s been 11 years since I bought a computer. Mac rules. Loving the response time to start up and smoothness of the new keyboard. Don't like I have to renew Office every year though.

customer_reviews.title: Do your research
customer_reviews.text: It all really depend on what you need when it comes to a computer! This in combination with my iPad has made course work a bit easier to keep track of electronically! It’s a quality product. It was not the 2020 model, but there wasn’t really any change, so it’s a pretty good price for a new Mac. It’s definitely more budget friendly.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for casual music production load!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for music production on FL Studio and casual use. Paired with a 2.7K monitor works smoothly. Struggles with Fortnite though - not sure if it’s because of the widescreen monitor.

customer_reviews.title: Best mac to own!

customer_reviews.title: Pram needs to be reset before any installation, not the latest version, but the older new drive
customer_reviews.text: I had a lot of trouble with installing my software until I had a lengthy call with Apple customer support. The agent read off scripts that didn't go anywhere, but finally suggested to 'zap the PRam'. You hold down a combination of keys when starting up the computer, and that does the resetting. This solved the problem. However there seems to be very little performance improvement over my previous 2014 Mac Mini, that I am still using for all my outdated software I bought. The old mac also had a card slot, more usb ports and a dedicated audio in. Also this is not a new macmini, actually a 2018 machine with the 'bigger' SSD drive.
customer_reviews.author: amaleshk

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: It is made of good quality and I prefer macOS to Windows for many reasons. When you compare all what it brings and the quality then you might understand why of the price. However, Apple is offering discounts on it's products every month

customer_reviews.title: The best support! 5 nm Apple processors in 2021!
customer_reviews.text: Apple always has the best support for their products. However, the Intel processor line will not be used in the Macintosh line in 2021. Apple has become so good at making the best processors for the other products they will make their own processors in 2021. The new processors will be much smaller at 5 nm. They will probably have new designs with all the leftover room they were probably more that they can provide in hardware or even smaller sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Ray ”Rip” VanRiper

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good, but a couple bad things
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I do like this machine even though they have NOT upgraded it in two years. Apple likes to say "re-engineered in no small way." One aspect of this claim I strongly disagree with is the USB-C ports on the back. They're horizontally configured, and they're so close together that it's not really possible to have two devices connected to adjacent ports. For example, I have two external drives, and I have to plug one into port 1, and the other plugged into port 3 because there's NOT enough space between the ports to connect devices next to each other. This is a huge design flaw!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linguist2be

customer_reviews.title: T2 Security Chip Knocked out on arrival
customer_reviews.text: A real pain to restore the T2 chip firmware. You are required to have a 2nd computer updated to Mojave (to download Configurator 2) 2 Thunderbolt 3 cables (so if your 2nd computer is "old", I.e., Thunderbolt 2 -> u need adaptors). It has become a Trail of Tears getting this thing to update. Apple just assumes you have a 2nd computer (Apple) and loads of time to do this. This should be a download or online fix. Apple is abusive to their faithful customers. As soon as a Hackintosh becomes more do-able-I am gone.
customer_reviews.author: Time the Avenger

customer_reviews.title: For those who feel duped "2018 2020"
customer_reviews.text: Apple doesnt always update hardware every year Instead they will provide a better value. The value upgrade from 2018 to 2020 is them offering double the storage they did in prior years for the same price. This is considered their "upgrade." I hope this makes sense to you people who ordered a 2020 but got a "2018 model instead." 1 or 2 years ago, divide your internal storage by half and thats what you would have gotten for the same amount of money.
